title: Quantum of Solace - Secondary Typeface
content:
Ok. So it is obvious that the Quantum of Solace logo utilizes Neutraface, but what about the font for the release date and the 007.com at the bottom of the ad? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123608im_/http:/typophile.com/files/quantum_4017.png)
author: lathen.kamas
